Labrador Retriever.description: Friendly, outgoing, and active companions who have more than enough affection to go around for a family looking for a medium-to-large dog.
funFacts: Originally bred to retrieve fishing nets in Newfoundland
Most popular dog breed in the US for 30+ years
Have webbed toes to help them swim
Labrador Retriever.amazonProducts: dog food labrador, dog toys large breed, dog leash training

German Shepherd.description: Large, athletic dogs that are courageous, loyal, and highly intelligent. Excellent working dogs and devoted family companions.
funFacts: Second most popular dog breed in the US
Used extensively as police, military, and service dogs
Can learn tasks after only 5 repetitions
German Shepherd.amazonProducts: german shepherd food, dog training collar, dog harness large

Golden Retriever.description: Intelligent, friendly, and devoted companions. Known for their beautiful golden coat and gentle temperament.
funFacts: Originally bred in Scotland to retrieve game birds
One of the most popular family dogs worldwide
Excellent therapy and service dogs
Golden Retriever.amazonProducts: golden retriever food, dog grooming brush, dog shampoo golden coat

French Bulldog.description: Small, muscular dogs with distinctive bat ears and a playful, affectionate nature. Perfect for apartment living.
funFacts: Cannot swim due to heavy front structure
Third most popular breed in the US
Originally bred as companions for lace workers in England
French Bulldog.amazonProducts: french bulldog harness, dog cooling vest, small dog bed

Beagle.description: Merry, friendly hounds with an excellent sense of smell. Great family pets who love companionship.
funFacts: Have approximately 220 million scent receptors
Bred for hunting rabbits and hares
Snoopy from Peanuts is a beagle
Beagle.amazonProducts: beagle food, dog puzzle toys, dog tracking collar

Poodle.description: Exceptionally intelligent and active dogs available in three sizes: Standard, Miniature, and Toy. Known for their hypoallergenic coat.
funFacts: Second most intelligent dog breed
Originally bred as water retrievers in Germany
Their fancy haircuts were practical for swimming
Poodle.amazonProducts: poodle grooming kit, dog hair clippers, hypoallergenic dog food

Rottweiler.description: Robust, powerful dogs with a calm confidence and unwavering loyalty. Excellent guard dogs and devoted companions.
funFacts: One of the oldest herding breeds
Used to drive cattle to market in ancient Rome
Nearly went extinct in the 1800s
Rottweiler.amazonProducts: rottweiler food large breed, heavy duty dog leash, dog training treats

Chihuahua.description: The smallest dog breed with a big personality. Loyal, charming, and often sassy companions.
funFacts: Smallest dog breed in the world
Can live 14-16 years or longer
Named after the Mexican state of Chihuahua
Chihuahua.amazonProducts: chihuahua clothes, small dog carrier, tiny dog food

Siberian Husky.description: Medium-sized working dogs with striking blue eyes and thick coats. Energetic, outgoing, and mischievous.
funFacts: Can run up to 30 miles per hour
Bred by the Chukchi people of Siberia
Have a double coat that keeps them warm in -60°F
Siberian Husky.amazonProducts: husky food high protein, dog sled harness, dog winter coat

Border Collie.description: The most intelligent dog breed, known for their incredible herding ability and boundless energy.
funFacts: Ranked #1 in intelligence among all dog breeds
Can learn a new command in less than 5 seconds
Need 1-2 hours of exercise daily
Border Collie.amazonProducts: border collie food, dog agility equipment, herding ball dog toy

Siamese.description: Sleek, vocal cats with distinctive color points and striking blue eyes. Very social and affectionate.
funFacts: One of the oldest and most recognizable cat breeds
Extremely vocal and 'chatty' with their owners
Born completely white and develop color as they mature
Siamese.amazonProducts: siamese cat food, cat interactive toys, cat tree tall

Maine Coon.description: One of the largest domestic cat breeds with a gentle, friendly nature. Known for their lion-like mane and tufted ears.
funFacts: Can weigh up to 25 pounds
Excellent mousers despite their gentle nature
One of the oldest natural breeds in North America
Maine Coon.amazonProducts: maine coon cat food, large cat litter box, cat grooming brush long hair

Persian.description: Long-haired, flat-faced cats known for their luxurious coat and calm demeanor. Affectionate lap cats.
funFacts: One of the oldest cat breeds
Require daily grooming to prevent matting
Featured in many famous artworks and films
Persian.amazonProducts: persian cat food, cat grooming tools, cat eye wipes

Bengal.description: Athletic, wild-looking cats with distinctive spotted or marbled coats. Energetic and playful.
funFacts: Bred by crossing domestic cats with Asian Leopard Cats
Love water and may join you in the shower
Extremely active and need lots of stimulation
Bengal.amazonProducts: bengal cat food high protein, cat water fountain, cat climbing tower

British Shorthair.description: Round-faced, chunky cats with dense, plush coats. Easygoing and affectionate without being overly demanding.
funFacts: Inspiration for the Cheshire Cat in Alice in Wonderland
Can live 14-20 years
Come in over 30 different color combinations
British Shorthair.amazonProducts: british shorthair food, cat bed large, cat toys interactive

Ragdoll.description: Large, docile cats that go limp when picked up (hence the name). Blue eyes and semi-long fur.
funFacts: Known for going limp like a ragdoll when held
One of the largest domestic cat breeds
Extremely gentle and patient with children
Ragdoll.amazonProducts: ragdoll cat food, cat carrier large, cat brush for long hair

Scottish Fold.description: Distinctive folded ears give them an owl-like appearance. Sweet-tempered and adaptable.
funFacts: Ears fold due to a genetic mutation
All kittens are born with straight ears
Known for sitting in a 'Buddha position'
Scottish Fold.amazonProducts: scottish fold food, cat scratcher, cat window perch

Sphynx.description: Hairless cats with wrinkled skin and large ears. Warm to touch and extremely affectionate.
funFacts: Not completely hairless - covered in fine down
Body temperature is 4°F higher than other cats
Require regular bathing to remove oil buildup
Sphynx.amazonProducts: sphynx cat food, cat sweater, cat heating pad

Russian Blue.description: Elegant cats with shimmering blue-gray coats and brilliant green eyes. Shy with strangers but loyal to family.
funFacts: Naturally occurring breed from Russia
Nearly hypoallergenic due to lower protein production
Known for their gentle smile
Russian Blue.amazonProducts: russian blue cat food, cat toys mice, quiet cat litter box

Abyssinian.description: Sleek, active cats with ticked coats that shimmer. Playful, curious, and highly intelligent.
funFacts: One of the oldest known cat breeds
Extremely active and need lots of play
Love to climb to high places
Abyssinian.amazonProducts: abyssinian cat food, cat climbing wall, cat puzzle feeder
